equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object other)
Equality comparison of Card objects. No Card is ever equal to something that is not a Card, and two Card objects are equal if they are the same object, or have the same suit and rank.

equals in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
The result of the equality comparison.
